ttt

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • ttt.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

    Board Class

    Controls aspects of data handling for the board as well as presentation of board to player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      The only constructor for the board class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String convertToSlot(int location)
      Converts the single digit value given to the equivalent two value address of the slot array location.
      void drawBoard()
      Handles the drawing of the Tic-Tac-Toe board onto console.
      java.lang.String getSlotInfo(int row, int column)
      Allows for the obtaining of the data within the slots array address given.
      void initializeData()
      Method directly responsible for the initialization of the data for the boards slots.

        public Board()
        The only constructor for the board class. Handles the initialization of the boards data.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeData

        public void initializeData()
        Method directly responsible for the initialization of the data for the boards slots.

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard()
        Handles the drawing of the Tic-Tac-Toe board onto console.

      • convertToSlot

        public java.lang.String convertToSlot(int location)
        Converts the single digit value given to the equivalent two value address of the slot array location.
        Parameters:
        location - The single digit value that represents an array location for the slots array.
        Returns:
        Returns the two value address.

      • setSlotInfo

        public void setSlotInfo(int row,
                        int column,
                        java.lang.String newValue)
        Allows for the setting of a value within the slots arrayfor the given data address.
        Parameters:
        row - First value of data address for slots array.
        column - Second value of data address for slots array.
        newValue - New data to be put into the address of the array.

      • getSlotInfo

        public java.lang.String getSlotInfo(int row,
                                    int column)
        Allows for the obtaining of the data within the slots array address given.
        Parameters:
        row - First value of the data address for the slots array.
        column - Second value of the data address for the slots array.
        Returns:
        Returns data of address specified.
